Package org.fluentjdbc

Class DatabaseStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fluentjdbc.DatabaseStatement
  • @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public class DatabaseStatement
extends Object
    Utility methods for generating queries (createUpdateStatement(String, List, List), createInsertSql(String, Collection), converting parameters to PreparedStatement (bindParameter(PreparedStatement, int, Object) and comparing values (dbValuesAreEqual(Object, DatabaseRow, String, Connection).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected static org.slf4j.Logger logger  

    • Constructor Summary

      DatabaseStatement()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static <T> void addBatch​(PreparedStatement statement, Iterable<T> objects, Collection<Function<T,​?>> columnValueExtractors)
      Binds the parameters and calls PreparedStatement.addBatch().
      static void bindParameter​(PreparedStatement stmt, int index, Object parameter)
      Calls the correct PreparedStatement setXXX method based on the type of the parameter.
      static int bindParameters​(PreparedStatement stmt, List<Object> parameters)
      sets all parameters on the statement, calling bindParameter(PreparedStatement, int, Object) to convert each one
      static int bindParameters​(PreparedStatement stmt, List<Object> parameters, int start)
      sets all parameters on the statement, calling bindParameter(PreparedStatement, int, Object) to convert each one
      static String createDeleteStatement​(String tableName, List<String> whereConditions)
      Creates String for DELETE FROM tableName WHERE whereCondition AND whereCondition
      static String createInsertSql​(String tableName, Collection<String> fieldNames)
      Creates String for INSERT INTO tableName (fieldName, fieldName, ...) VALUES (?, ?, ...)
      static String createUpdateStatement​(String tableName, List<String> updateFields, List<String> whereConditions)
      Creates String for UPDATE tableName SET updateField = ?, updateField = ? WHERE whereCondition AND whereCondition
      static boolean dbValuesAreEqual​(Object value, DatabaseRow row, String field, Connection connection)
      Returns true if the object value equals the specified field name in the database.
      static int executeUpdate​(String query, List<Object> parameters, Connection connection)
      Calls Connection.prepareStatement(String) with the statement, bindParameters(PreparedStatement, List), converting each parameter in the process and executes the statement
      static String parameterString​(int parameterCount)
      Create a string like ?, ?, ? with the parameterCount number of '?'
      static Object toDatabaseType​(Object parameter, Connection connection)
      Converts parameter to canonical database type.

      • bindParameters

        public static int bindParameters​(PreparedStatement stmt,
                                 List<Object> parameters)
                          throws SQLException

                                 List<Object> parameters,

                          throws SQLException

      • bindParameter

        public static void bindParameter​(PreparedStatement stmt,
                                 int index,
                                 @Nullable
                                 Object parameter)
                          throws SQLException
        Calls the correct PreparedStatement setXXX method based on the type of the parameter. Supports Instant, ZonedDateTime, OffsetDateTime, LocalDate, String, Enum, UUID, Double
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • toDatabaseType

        public static Object toDatabaseType​(@Nullable
                                    Object parameter,
                                    Connection connection)
        Converts parameter to canonical database type. Supports Instant, ZonedDateTime, OffsetDateTime, LocalDate, String, Enum, UUID, Double

      • addBatch

        public static <T> void addBatch​(PreparedStatement statement,
                                Iterable<T> objects,
                                Collection<Function<T,​?>> columnValueExtractors)
                         throws SQLException
        Binds the parameters and calls PreparedStatement.addBatch().
        Throws:
        SQLException
        See Also:
        bindParameter(PreparedStatement, int, Object)

      • executeUpdate

        public static int executeUpdate​(String query,
                                List<Object> parameters,
                                Connection connection)
        Calls Connection.prepareStatement(String) with the statement, bindParameters(PreparedStatement, List), converting each parameter in the process and executes the statement

      • createInsertSql

        public static String createInsertSql​(String tableName,
                                     Collection<String> fieldNames)
        Creates String for INSERT INTO tableName (fieldName, fieldName, ...) VALUES (?, ?, ...)

        Creates String for DELETE FROM tableName WHERE whereCondition AND whereCondition

        public static String createUpdateStatement​(String tableName,
                                           List<String> updateFields,
                                           List<String> whereConditions)
        Creates String for UPDATE tableName SET updateField = ?, updateField = ? WHERE whereCondition AND whereCondition

      • parameterString

        public static String parameterString​(int parameterCount)
        Create a string like ?, ?, ? with the parameterCount number of '?'

      • dbValuesAreEqual

        public static boolean dbValuesAreEqual​(Object value,
                                       DatabaseRow row,
                                       String field,
                                       Connection connection)
                                throws SQLException
        Returns true if the object value equals the specified field name in the database. Converts toDatabaseType(Object, Connection) to decrease number of false positives
        Throws:
        SQLException
